mapper.select: select q.id,s.studentName,c.className,q.questionContent,q.questionTime,q.questionGiveIntegral from student s inner join question q on s.id=q.studentId inner join stuclass c on c.id=s.classId

select q.id,s.studentName,c.className,q.questionGiveIntegral,q.questionContent,q.questionTime,q.studentId from question q inner join student s on q.studentId=s.id inner join stuclass c on s.classId=c.id where q.id=#{id}
select * from student s,question q where q.studentId=s.id and s.id=#{id} order by q.questionTime desc
